Service Details: - Provides individuals who are dying and their families with high-quality hospice palliative care in a tranquil home-like setting- Aims to meet the patient’s physical, emotional, and spiritual needs to make their last days peaceful, comfortable and meaningful- Provides support and guidance to patients and their loved ones through a specialized professional care team- Offers 24 hour nursing care (as per provincial policy, there is a daily charge for these services) for patients with a limited life expectancy, short-term admission for pain, and symptom management or respite care to provide relief for caregivers
Eligibility: Ages: 19 year(s) and upReferral is required from family physician which is reviewed by palliative care team
